overall.description: Return the cross product of two (arrays of) vectors.

axisa.description: Axis of a that defines the vector(s).  By default, the last axis.

axisb.description: Axis of b that defines the vector(s).  By default, the last axis.

axisc.description: Axis of c containing the cross product vector(s).  Ignored if both input vectors have dimension 2, as the return is scalar. By default, the last axis.

axis.description: If defined, the axis of a, b and c that defines the vector(s) and cross product(s).  Overrides axisa, axisb and axisc.
